channel.title: Stories from amazon.com - Digg
channel.description: Archive of the best amazon.com stories on Digg including articles, videos, and photos

item.title: Starting To Run Low On Paper Products? Schedule Your Next Delivery
item.description: If you're having a hard time finding paper towels in-store, it's worth getting ahead of it now. This is much easier than lining up in front of a super market on restock day, right?

item.title: Cut Out The Noise And Get The Most Out Of Your Music With AirPods Pro
item.description: Your roommate is rustling around in the kitchen, your dog is in the yard barking at squirrels, your neighbors are fighting loudly and you just want some peace. Thankfully, the AirPods Pro offer shockingly effective noise cancelling.

item.title: Keep The House Clean Without Making Too Much Noise
item.description: This robotic vacuum from Eufy has nearly 15,000 reviews on Amazon, and still has an impressive 4.5/5 average.

item.title: Spending A Lot Of Time Cooking? Cut Down On Meal Prep With The Instant Pot Duo
item.description: Cook up large portions over the weekend, and your lunch is taken care of for the rest of the week.

item.title: Instead Of Disposable Gloves, A Single Reusable Pair Reduces Waste
item.description: Gloves can help reduce your exposure risk, but disposable ones aren't always easy to find. And frankly, medical professionals need them much more right now. Grab these reusable gloves, and then you won't have to worry about the limited supply.

item.title: Which One Of These Loose Leaf Teas Will Be Mom's New Favorite?
item.description: If Mom loves tea, this extremely well-reviewed variety pack will make the perfect Mother's Day gift.

item.title: If You Absolutely Must Go Out, These Cloth Masks Are Worth Wearing
item.description: Full-on protective masks should be reserved for those in need, but other folks should keep their germs to themselves with simple cloth coverings whenever possible.

item.title: What Does Mom Want For Mother's Day? A Little Relaxation
item.description: Things have been stressful lately, so give mom some nice scented candles for Mother's Day. After all, it's less than a month away.

item.title: Save 20% On This Anker Battery Pack, Keep Your Phone Charged Anywhere
item.description: This 20100mAh USB battery pack can juice up your smartphone upwards of four times on a single charge. If you're away from plugs for days, having a battery pack is crucial.

item.title: Turns Out, 'Scrabble' Still Slaps
item.description: We've spent a lot of our lockdown playing "Scrabble," and it holds up incredibly well — especially given the circumstances.

item.title: Need A New Two-Player Game For Your Lockdown? This Game Lets You Work Together
item.description: "Codenames: Duet" has you team up with your partner to figure out exactly what's happening in the world of secret agents.

item.title: Tifa, Aerith and Barret Are Waiting For You To Join Them In 'Final Fantasy VII Remake'
item.description: One of the biggest games of our misspent youths has been lovely remade with modern tastes in mind.

item.title: There's Never Been A Better Time To Dive Deep Into Raspberry Pi
item.description: Want to make your own cool mini computer? This Raspberry Pi 4 starter kit gives you everything you need to begin your journey.

item.title: Stop Stressing Over Taxes, And Let The Software Do The Heavy Lifting
item.description: Doing your taxes can be a lot less stressful with the right tools in hand. Plus, Turbotax Deluxe is currently 17 percent off at Amazon right now.

item.title: These Maps Tell Us More About The People Who Made Them Than The Geography They Represent
item.description: Maps represent much more than geography. They give us a look at the culture, politics and aesthetic values of those who created them.

item.title: Get Six Months Of Game Pass Ultimate For 50% Off, Play Dozens Of Xbox One And PC Games
item.description: Right now, you can get six months of Xbox Game Pass Ultimate on Amazon for half-off. "Minecraft," "GTA V," "Gears 5," "Ori And The Will Of The Wisps" and more will keep you busy during lockdown.

item.title: Every Cup Of Coffee Is Superior With A Nice French Press
item.description: With a 4.5/5 average rating based on more than 9,000 reviews on Amazon, this affordable french press is easy to recommend for any coffee lover.

item.title: Trying To Eat Healthier In Lockdown? Don't Compromise On Flavor
item.description: Don't let bland food halt your progress. This cookbook is filled with healthy dishes that you'll actually want to eat.

item.title: While You're Stuck At Home, You Might As Well Make It Smarter, Right?
item.description: Want to control your smart appliances with your voice in every single room? Grab some Echo Dots right now at a 20 percent discount.

item.title: Light Up The World: This LED-Lit Globe Also Shows The Constellations
item.description: Not only can you get a 360-degree view of our planet, but the stars shine here as well.

item.title: Pre-Order 'Final Fantasy VII Remake,' Get A Bonus PS4 Theme And Chocobo Chick DLC
item.description: Revisit Midgar with a reimagined "Final Fantasy VII" on PS4. Launching on April 10th, now's the time to get your pre-order in.

item.title: Stock Up On Easter Candy Without Leaving Your Home
item.description: Easter is nearly here, so it's the perfect time to stock up on candy. Even if the egg hunt is canceled, your basket will still be filled with sweets.

item.title: Maps Aren't Just Functional, This Book Shows Just How Beautiful They Can Actually Be
item.description: Sure, maps tell us where we are, but they can show us so much more. Every single shelf should have a copy of this hardcover book filled with gorgeous illustrated maps.

item.title: Rely On K-Cups For Your Daily Caffeine Intake? These Compostable Cups Are A Must-Have
item.description: You can enjoy a quick cup of coffee in the morning without contributing to the mountain of plastic waste we already have.

item.title: Get Started On Your Next Project, Save $249 On A MacBook Air
item.description: Write your first book, tackle an exciting design project or start creating your dream app with this rock-solid MacBook Air for as low as $749.99.

item.title: Learn A New Language, Get A Full Year Of Rosetta Stone For 53% Off
item.description: Right now, you can get 12 months of access to Rosetta Stone's 24 language-learning programs for just $85. Spanish, French, Chinese, Japanese, Arabic, Hebrew and many more are included in this bundle.

item.title: Julia Rothman Illustrates Everything We Need To Know About The Plants And Animals That Matter Most
item.description: From the natural world to farm living to the food on our tables, nobody gives us a better look at our flora and fauna than Julia Rothman.

item.title: Expand Your Switch Or Smartphone Storage While These Samsung Micro SD Cards Are On Sale
item.description: For a limited time, Amazon is discounting select Samsung micro SD cards by up to 26 percent. If your Switch storage is starting to get a bit tight, now's the time to buy.

item.title: Control This Vacuum With An App, Keep The Floor Spotless
item.description: Since we're spending more time at home, things have been a bit messier than usual. Invest in this tiptop robotic vacuum, and take one chore off the list.

item.title: Save 30% Off The Instant Pot Duo, And Dinner Gets A Whole Lot Easier
item.description: Now that it's bad form to go grab a burger or some groceries on a whim, planning meals ahead of time is more important. And with a multi-cooker in play, the options are endless.

item.title: We're Spending A Lot Of Time And Home, So Let's Fix It Up Some
item.description: Drills, saws, work lights and more are all included in this beefy power tool set from DeWalt. That door ain't gonna hang itself, now is it?

item.title: Save $50 On The Latest iPad, Get The Creative Juices Flowing While Hunkered Down
item.description: Snag the 10.2-inch iPad, and you can hone your artistic skills with the Apple Pencil (sold separately), lay down some beats in Garageband and keep your DIY videos playing round the clock.

item.title: Nothing To Read? Kindle Unlimited Has Over A Million Titles
item.description: Try Kindle Unlimited free for 30 days, and catch up on loads of digital magazines, audiobooks and ebooks. Renews at $9.99 per month.

item.title: We've Got Nowhere To Be, So We Might As Well Binge Watch While The Fire TV Stick Is 43% Off
item.description: If you're a Prime member, you can get a Fire TV Stick with an Alexa-enabled remote for just $22.99.

item.title: Keep Your Phone And Earbuds Juiced Up With This Dual Wireless Charger
item.description: Keep two devices topped up throughout the day without plugging and unplugging. Even better, clipping the digital coupon before checkout will save you a few bucks right off the top.

item.title: Tackle Boredom Head-On With One Of Our Favorite Games
item.description: This simple electronic game has thousands of phrases to keep us guessing, and gives us all something to keep our minds busy.

item.title: Good Thing You're Not In The Office, This Hilarious Card Game Is Raunchy
item.description: The NSFW version of "Unstable Unicorns" is a perfect distraction. It's ridiculous, funny and more than a little naughty.

item.title: Make Your USB-C Port Work For You With This Affordable Hub
item.description: A growing number of devices are shipping with USB-C ports, so let's put 'em to use. This hub delivers two standard USB 3.0 ports, an HDMI port, an SD card slot and a TF slot.

item.title: Top-Tier Sony Noise-Cancelling Headphones Make Working From Home Tolerable
item.description: We're veteran work-from-homers here at Digg, so we know from experience that noise-cancelling headphones will make the work day so much easier — especially if family or roommates are around.

item.title: Our Favorite Bluetooth Keyboard Costs Less Than Half Of Apple's
item.description: Here at Digg, we're used to the WFH lifestyle, so we're sharing some of our favorite picks with you. This keyboard is superb, and it won't cost you much.

item.title: Pinky Promise: Pre-Order 'Doom Eternal,' Save $10
item.description: The next highly-anticipated 'Doom' game is less than a week away. Don't sleep on these demons.

item.title: Pre-Load 'Animal Crossing: New Horizons' Now, Keep The Cabin Fever Away
item.description: The brand new "Animal Crossing" for the Switch will be playable at the stroke of midnight eastern time on March 20th, so pre-load the digital version right now, and have it ready to go.

item.title: Working From Home? Step Up From Your Laptop Screen With This Affordable Monitor
item.description: Loads of people are now working from home — away from their comfortable work setup. Make things easier on yourself with this well-regarded Asus monitor.

item.title: If You Want To Play This Colorful Party Game, You Better Get Good At Lying To Your Friends
item.description: "Bamboozled" is a perfect fit for game night, but don't be surprised when you get duped by a loved one.

item.title: Visualize The Impact And Struggles Of All Of Womankind With These Jaw-Dropping Maps
item.description: It's Women's History Month, so it's a good time to reflect on the most pressing issues and important achievements of women in every corner of the map.

item.title: Keep Your Phone Juiced With Up To 40% Off Charging Accessories
item.description: Cables, wireless chargers, battery packs and more from Anker are up to 40 percent off at Amazon today.

item.title: This Board Game Is A Work Of Art
item.description: "Azul" by Plan B Games is fun to play, but the aesthetics are what set it apart from other games. Everything about it is vibrant, warm and absolutely lovely to look at.

item.title: All We Want To Do Is Play 'Super Mario World' And 'Link To The Past' Right Now
item.description: We're looking forward to a year packed with notable games, but all we want to do right now is play the games of our youth on the SNES Classic.

item.title: Gaming Laptops Are No Joke These Days, This Asus Can Handle 144Hz
item.description: With a GeForce RTX 2070, Core i7-8750H, and a 512 gig solid-state drive, this gaming laptop is surprisingly powerful. And when you buy from Amazon, you can save $250.

item.title: Your Ancient Laptop Just Isn't Going To Cut It
item.description: Need some tech for your makeshift home office? Dell has some terrific laptops, desktops and accessories available for budgets large and small.
